mapper.select: SELECT c.course_name, c.course_id, c.course_period, c.course_current_enrollment FROM course c WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.professor_id = #{professorId} AND c.course_status in ('open', 'OPEN')

SELECT r.student_id, s.student_name, a.attendance_id, a.attendance_late, a.attendance_absent, a.attendance_remarks, ah.attendance_history_date, ah.attendance_history_status FROM registration r JOIN student s ON r.student_id = s.student_id JOIN attendance a ON r.student_id = a.student_id AND r.course_id = a.course_id LEFT JOIN attendance_history ah ON a.attendance_id = ah.attendance_id AND ah.attendance_history_date = #{attendanceDate} WHERE r.course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance_history (attendance_id, attendance_history_date, attendance_history_status, updated_date) VALUES (#{attendanceId}, #{attendanceDate}, #{attendanceStatus}, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE attendance_history_status = VALUES(attendance_history_status)
